text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-51-74V4 15.6" 144 Hz FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Starfield. The build quality of the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-51-74V4 15.6" 144 Hz FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-51-74V4 15.6" 144 Hz FHD IPS GTX 1060 6 GB VRAM i7-8750H 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!
